qa.name: Aria
qa.appearance: Petite with bright eyes and messy hair

hf.name: Elder Oak
hf.appearance: Massive oak tree with a face in its trunk

xc.name: Finn
xc.appearance: Tall and lean with leaf-like hair

json_to_edit.voice_over: In the heart of the enchanted forest, secrets as old as time itself were about to be revealed.
json_to_edit.description: Aria and her companions gather around the Elder Oak to learn ancient wisdom.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Rustling leaves, distant bird calls, gentle breeze
json_to_edit.name: Wisdom of the Elder Oak
json_to_edit.scene_summary: The wise old tree shares secrets with Aria and her companions in the heart of the enchanted forest.

qa.action: A wide view of the enchanted forest clearing, centered on the massive Elder Oak.

hf.action: Aria approaches the Elder Oak, her eyes wide with wonder.

tr.action: The face in Elder Oak's trunk slowly opens its eyes, focusing on Aria.

xc.action: Whisper swirls around the clearing, playfully tousling Aria's hair.

ka.action: Finn stands guard at the edge of the clearing, watchful and protective.

fn.action: Elder Oak's mouth moves, speaking ancient wisdom to the gathered group.

af.action: Aria, Whisper, and Finn react with awe as glowing symbols appear in the air.

qo.action: The entire clearing is bathed in a soft, magical light as Elder Oak imparts its final secret.

edit_command: Add a new shot after every two existing shots, but don't change anything else in the scene.

updated_json.voice_over: In the heart of the enchanted forest, secrets as old as time itself were about to be revealed.
updated_json.description: Aria and her companions gather around the Elder Oak to learn ancient wisdom.
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Rustling leaves, distant bird calls, gentle breeze
updated_json.name: Wisdom of the Elder Oak
updated_json.scene_summary: The wise old tree shares secrets with Aria and her companions in the heart of the enchanted forest.

qa.action: A wide view of the enchanted forest clearing, centered on the massive Elder Oak.

hf.action: Aria approaches the Elder Oak, her eyes wide with wonder.

zx.action: The camera pans up the trunk of Elder Oak, revealing its enormous size and ancient presence.

tr.action: The face in Elder Oak's trunk slowly opens its eyes, focusing on Aria.

xc.action: Whisper swirls around the clearing, playfully tousling Aria's hair.

wy.action: The camera follows Whisper as it dances around the group, leaving a trail of shimmering air.

ka.action: Finn stands guard at the edge of the clearing, watchful and protective.

fn.action: Elder Oak's mouth moves, speaking ancient wisdom to the gathered group.

vb.action: From behind Aria, we see her companions leaning in, captivated by Elder Oak's words.

af.action: Aria, Whisper, and Finn react with awe as glowing symbols appear in the air.

qo.action: The entire clearing is bathed in a soft, magical light as Elder Oak imparts its final secret.

nm.action: The camera pulls up and away, showing the enchanted forest clearing glowing with residual magic.

label.rationale: we will add new shots after every two existing shots in the scene, as requested by the edit command. this will increase the total number of shots from 8 to 12. we'll create four new shots with creative descriptions that fit the scene's context and maintain the magical atmosphere. we'll update the `number_of_shots` field and add the new shots to the `shots` dictionary, adjusting the `list_display_order` accordingly. the new shots will be inserted after the second, fourth, sixth, and eighth original shots.

value.action: The camera pans up the trunk of Elder Oak, revealing its enormous size and ancient presence.
The camera follows Whisper as it dances around the group, leaving a trail of shimmering air.
From behind Aria, we see her companions leaning in, captivated by Elder Oak's words.
The camera pulls up and away, showing the enchanted forest clearing glowing with residual magic.
